me.lucko.helper.messaging

Interface ChannelAgent<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - the channel message type
    All Superinterfaces:
    Terminable

    public interface ChannelAgent<T>
extends Terminable
    Represents an agent for interacting with a Channels message streams.

    • Field Summary
